/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with white buildings, their balconies and awnings adding architectural interest. Parked cars line the side of the road, hinting at the life and activity in the area. A large tree stands on the corner, its branches reaching out over the street, providing a touch of nature amidst the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting light and shadows that add depth to the image.
